description: BCQL grammar - positions derived from numbered labels (1: = head, 2: = collocate)

relations.name: Adjectives (predicative)
relations.description: Adjective predicates with copula (e.g., 'hypothesis is valid', 'theory appears correct')

relations.name: Modifiers (adjectives)
relations.description: Adjectives modifying nouns (e.g., 'big house', 'red car')

relations.name: Subjects
relations.description: Subject of verbs

relations.name: Objects (direct)
relations.description: Direct objects of verbs

relations.name: Verbs (subject of)
relations.description: Verbs appearing near nouns (subjects)

relations.name: Nouns in compound
relations.description: Other nouns in compound (e.g., 'coffee house', 'house party')

relations.name: Prepositions
relations.description: Prepositions (e.g., 'house of', 'at the house')

relations.name: Adverbs
relations.description: Adverbs modifying nouns (e.g., 'almost home')

relations.name: Possessive nouns
relations.description: Possessive forms (e.g., 'house's')

relations.name: Predicate nouns
relations.description: Noun predicates with 'be' (e.g., 'theory is a science', 'this is evidence')

relations.name: Pronominal objects
relations.description: Pronouns as objects (e.g., 'tell them', 'see us')

relations.name: Pronominal subjects
relations.description: Pronouns as subjects (e.g., 'it works', 'they agree')

relations.name: Noun modifiers (of nouns)
relations.description: Nouns modifying nouns (e.g., 'city government', 'cancer research')

relations.name: Adjective modifiers (of adjectives)
relations.description: Adverbs modifying adjectives (e.g., 'very happy', 'extremely difficult')

relations.name: Verb modifiers
relations.description: Adverbs modifying verbs (e.g., 'quickly run', 'carefully analyze')

relations.name: Possessors
relations.description: Possessive nouns (e.g., 'John's house', 'government's policy')

relations.name: Pronominal possessors
relations.description: Possessive pronouns (e.g., 'my house', 'their policy')

relations.name: Wh-words
relations.description: Wh-words following verbs (e.g., 'know what', 'ask who')

relations.name: Infinitive complements
relations.description: Infinitive objects (e.g., 'want to go', 'need to know')

relations.name: -ing complements
relations.description: Gerund complements (e.g., 'enjoy reading', 'consider leaving')

relations.name: Passive constructions
relations.description: Passive voice (e.g., 'is known by', 'was developed by')

relations.name: Reflexive constructions
relations.description: Reflexive pronouns (e.g., 'protect themselves', 'enjoy himself')

relations.name: It-cleft constructions
relations.description: It's X to... patterns (e.g., 'it's important to note')

relations.name: Prepositional phrases
relations.description: Prepositional phrases (e.g., 'house in London', 'book on table')

relations.name: Adjective complements
relations.description: Adjectives as complements of verbs (e.g., 'consider important', 'keep clean')

relations.name: Adjectives (complements)
relations.description: Adjectives after verbs (e.g., 'becomes happy', 'seems difficult')

relations.name: Intransitive particles
relations.description: Particles after intransitive verbs (e.g., 'wake up', 'break down')

relations.name: Transitive particles
relations.description: Particles with transitive verbs (e.g., 'pick up', 'put down')

relations.name: Nouns (objects/subjects)
relations.description: Nouns appearing near verbs (objects/subjects)

relations.name: Particles
relations.description: Particles (e.g., 'give up', 'break down')

relations.name: Prepositions
relations.description: Prepositions (e.g., 'depend on', 'look at')

relations.name: Adverbs
relations.description: Adverbs modifying verbs

relations.name: Adjectives (verb context)
relations.description: Adjectives in verb context (e.g., 'become happy')

relations.name: Infinitive 'to'
relations.description: Infinitive marker (e.g., 'want to', 'need to')

relations.name: Other verbs
relations.description: Verb chains (e.g., 'try to make')

relations.name: Nouns modified
relations.description: Nouns modified by the adjective

relations.name: Adverbs (intensifiers)
relations.description: Adverbs modifying adjectives (e.g., 'very big')

relations.name: Verbs
relations.description: Verbs (e.g., 'be happy', 'become sad')

relations.name: Prepositions
relations.description: Prepositions (e.g., 'afraid of', 'good at')

relations.name: Coordinated adjectives (and/or)
relations.description: Adjectives in coordination (e.g., 'big and red')

relations.name: Dependency: nominal subject
relations.description: Verb with its nominal subject (e.g., 'theory explains')

relations.name: Dependency: passive nominal subject
relations.description: Verb with its passive nominal subject (e.g., 'theory is studied', 'article was submitted')

relations.name: Dependency: direct object
relations.description: Verb with its direct object (e.g., 'explain theory')

relations.name: Dependency: indirect object
relations.description: Verb with its indirect object (e.g., 'give me')

relations.name: Dependency: oblique nominal
relations.description: Verb with its oblique argument â€” prepositional object (e.g., 'depend on theory', 'contribute to X')

relations.name: Dependency: passive agent (by-phrase)
relations.description: Passive verb with its by-phrase agent (e.g., 'developed by researchers')

relations.name: Dependency: adjectival modifier
relations.description: Noun with its adjectival modifier (e.g., 'big theory')

relations.name: Dependency: case marker
relations.description: Noun with its case marker/preposition (e.g., 'theory of')

relations.name: Dependency: nominal modifier
relations.description: Noun with its nominal modifier (e.g., 'government policy')

relations.name: Dependency: possessive modifier
relations.description: Noun with its possessive modifier (e.g., "Darwin's theory", "its assumption")

relations.name: Dependency: compound
relations.description: Noun in compound with head noun (e.g., 'coffee house', 'null hypothesis')

relations.name: Dependency: appositional modifier
relations.description: Noun with its appositive (e.g., 'Darwin, the naturalist', 'NHST, an example')

relations.name: Dependency: relative clause modifier
relations.description: Noun with its relative clause verb (e.g., 'the theory that explains', 'questions that humans have pondered')

relations.name: Dependency: clausal modifier of noun
relations.description: Noun with its non-relative clausal modifier (e.g., 'a method used in experiments', 'ability to learn')

relations.name: Dependency: coordinated nouns
relations.description: Noun with its coordinated noun (e.g., 'theory and practice', 'traditions and practices')

relations.name: Dependency: coordinated verbs
relations.description: Verb with its coordinated verb (e.g., 'analyze and interpret', 'revisit and determine')

relations.name: Dependency: adverbial modifier
relations.description: Verb/adjective with its adverbial modifier (e.g., 'quickly run', 'increasingly challenged')

relations.name: Dependency: auxiliary
relations.description: Verb with its auxiliary (e.g., 'will explain', 'can benefit')

relations.name: Dependency: passive auxiliary
relations.description: Passive verb with its passive auxiliary (e.g., 'is studied', 'was developed', 'being challenged')

relations.name: Dependency: copula
relations.description: Noun/adjective with its copula (e.g., 'is important', 'are optimists')

relations.name: Dependency: marker
relations.description: Verb with its subordinating marker (e.g., 'to explain', 'that works')

relations.name: Dependency: clausal complement
relations.description: Verb/adjective with its clausal complement (e.g., 'believe that X', 'able to gain')

relations.name: Dependency: clausal complement of adjective
relations.description: Adjective with its clausal complement (e.g., 'happy that...', 'certain that...', 'able to...')

relations.name: Dependency: open clausal complement
relations.description: Verb with its open clausal complement (e.g., 'try to explain', 'hope to gain')

relations.name: Dependency: phrasal verb particle
relations.description: Verb with its phrasal particle (e.g., 'give up', 'carry out', 'break down')

relations.name: Dependency: flat multiword expression
relations.description: Flat multiword expression (e.g., 'New York', 'null hypothesis')

relations.name: Dependency: predicative adjective
relations.description: Noun with its predicative adjective via copula (e.g., 'accuracy is comparable', 'assumptions are valid')

relations.name: Dependency: adjectival open complement
relations.description: Verb with adjectival xcomp (e.g., 'consider important', 'find useful')
